extension.summary: Import and play media items from an Emby Media Server or Jellyfin
extension.description: Emby Media Importer allows you to import and play media libraries, for movies, tv shows and music videos, from Emby Media Server or Jellyfin. Thus using Emby / Jellyfin as a metadata manager (server) and Kodi as player (client). In addition playback data can be synced across multiple clients, for each user on Emby / Jellyfin.
